item.title: Strongest evidence yet for past life on Mars; The Romans impact on the British economy; Link between exercise and your microbiome
item.description: Episode 320 Was Mars once home to alien life? The evidence is stronger than ever, since NASA’s discovery of rocks marked by patterns similar to those made by microbes on Earth. Found in an area now named “Bright Angel”, these rocks give us a tantalising insight into Mars’ ancient past - but just how definitive is this finding? It’s long been thought that when the Roman Empire withdrew from Britain in the early 400s, the result was chaos and economic collapse - leading us into the “Dark Ages”... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/ARML6831509338

item.title: HH599: Encore Presentations-Your Second Brain
item.description:
Today, I want to talk to you about your second brain. Yes, did you realize you actually have two brains and your gut is your second brain.

About the Host:

Melissa is an Integrative Health Practitioner helping people get to the root cause of their health issues. Melissa neither diagnoses nor cures but helps bring your body back into balance by helping discover your “toxic load” and then removing the toxins... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/dont-wait-for-your-wake-up-call/
